Posts.Content: Mar 24, 2011 02:54PM ginger_mea wrote: After my annual mamo showed suspecious calcs. I first had a lumpectomy 2/1/11 and one of the margins wasn't clear went back in on 2/16/11 had further margins and one node, all came back clear.  Had an MRI before that which showed nothing (maybe it was too close to the chest or deep I don't know, the Dr. was surprised).  Before I was set to start RAD the Oncologist sent me for another mamo which showed deeper calc. he wanted them out, so I had another sugery this past Tues., just got the call that there was more malignancy another lumpectomy and 1/3" of invasion.  This coming week I am going in again (4th time) to have those margins removed to hopefully have everything come back clear so I can begin RAD, anyone have anything similar to this?
Posts.Title: How many others had to have more surgery? BioAdoptMom3 cantgarden

Posts.Content: ginger_mea wrote: Has anyone experienced a salty taste in their mouth?  It's been 15 days since my first chemo (TCH) and as of yesterday I have a salty taste in my mouth. It is like my saliva is secreting salt. Anyone else??? Dx 3/28/2011, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 3, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Taste issues ginger_mea ginger_mea
